thread.title: Ex-Knick Lamar Odom's condition worsening while in coma, report says
thread.title_full: Ex-Knick Lamar Odom's condition worsening while in coma, report says

author: Charles Curtis | For NJ Advance Media
title: Ex-Knick Lamar Odom's condition worsening while in coma, report says
text:
TMZ said Odom's "condition has deteriorated." Though Odom did give Kardashian's hand a squeeze, doctors thought it might have been involuntary. 
Here's more from the site's report: "As of Thursday morning, our sources say Lamar has shown no signs of consciousness or improvement. We're told 4 organs, including his kidneys, continue to fail. Our sources say doctors have been clear ... the fact that Lamar is not getting better significantly reduces his chances of survival." 
Earlier in the day, The Daily News said sources told the publication Odom fluttered his eyes and had successful dialysis treatment for kidney failure that doctors thought was due to alleged drug use . 
Follow Charles Curtis on Twitter @charlescurtis82 . Find NJ.com on Facebook
